rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Funds from the U.S. Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority will be used to complete late-stage development and testing of a pre-pandemic mRNA-based vaccine against H5N1 avian influenza.

rationale: The segment uses neutral/procedural language ('advance development', 'complete late-stage development and testing') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
statement_text: Funds from the U.S. Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority will be used to complete late-stage development and testing of a pre-pandemic mRNA-based vaccine against H5N1 avian influenza.
